summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5968 for the improvement of East 62nd Street from Sand Point Way to east line of Avion City Addition; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79734, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
